name: ✨Illustration No. 1 Series: Daydreaming ✨
description:
Give life to the dreams you have hidden,
you will discover that you can live these moments
with your eyes open and your fears asleep,
with your eyes closed and your dreams awake.
(fragment)

🍃

I was thinking of a text to tell you about
this new series and I remembered
this poem of Mario Benedetti that puts in words
perfectly the feelings I want to
transmit with this illustrations.

I hope you like it.

Have a beautiful day.

Martin

@thedominguez_ok

✨👁✨
